Update an existing OIDC client

<Heading

  as={"h2"}

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"description":"Client ID","in":"path","name":"id","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"callbackURLs":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"isPublic":{"type":"boolean"},"logoutCallbackURLs":{"items":{"type":"string"},"type":"array"},"name":{"maxLength":50,"type":"string"},"pkceEnabled":{"type":"boolean"}},"required":["callbackURLs","name"],"type":"object"}}},"description":"Client information","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
